FuncDef: This command configures whether a GMPLS tunnel group is at the head-end or tail-end of the set of member GMPLS LSPs from the perspective of GMPLS LSP setup. It can only configured if the GMPLS tunnel group has no members; for example, if none have yet been configured.

ParaDef.Info: Sets the GMPLS tunnel group to operate as a head-end.
Sets the GMPLS tunnel group to operate as a tail-end.
